Summary: Green ball of light size of the sun.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my school playing basketball when it happened me and 2 other friends saw it because it was enormasly big and flashy , it was a green ball of light maybe the size of the sun it went away quikly i saw it appear into the sky and than disapear maybe 3 seconds later but it was moving quikly so i didnt have time to capture it on video. Me and my friends were scared because it felt like it was plumiting into the earth
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
